remarks: Given a function from a filtered set to a topological space, define the set of limit points of the function.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 8-Nov-2009.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)
statement: flfval $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ L e. ( Fil ` Y ) /\ F : Y --> X ) -> ( ( J fLimf L ) ` F ) = ( J fLim ( ( X FilMap F ) ` L ) ) ) $.
